data.name: Message_AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteConsole
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete selected console ? Warning: deleting console will delete all roms that belong to this console, this mean roms of this console will be deleted from playlists too.

data.name: Message_AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteConsolesGroup
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete selected consoles group ? Warning: deleting consoles group will delete all consoles that belong to that group, in result all roms that belong to these consoles will be deleted from playlists too.

data.name: Message_DoYouWantToSaveProfile
data.value: Do you want to save profile first ?

data.name: Description_BrowseForRomsFolder
data.value: Browse for folder that contain roms

data.name: Message_PleaseSelectConsoleToAddRoms
data.value: Please select a console first. Roms can be added to consoles only.

data.name: Message_AreYouSureYouWantRoStopCurrentProgress
data.value: Are you sure you want to stop current progress ?

data.name: Message_ThisConsoleNameAlreadyTaken
data.value: The console name you entered already taken by another console in this consoles group

data.value: Allows to edit the console name, extesnions and other general options.

data.value: This will save and apply current style to console, continue ?

data.value: Please enter consoles group name first.

data.value: This consoles group name already taken by another group.

data.value: Are you sure ? this first will apply style to current consoles group then replace all child consoles with same style, continue ?

data.value: This will apply current style to consoles group first. Continue ?

data.name: Message_AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteSelectedRoms
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete selected roms ?

data.value: This name already taken by another consoles group.

data.value: Are you sure you want to delete selected playlists group ? Warning! Deleting this playlists group will remove all playlist(s) that belong to this group.

data.value: This name already taken by another playlist.

data.value: This name already taken by another playlists group.

data.value: Are you sure you want to remove selected rom(s) from playlist

data.value: This will not effect the rom(s) and only remove from this playlist.

data.value: Are you sure ? this first will apply style to current playlists group then replace all child playlists with same style, continue ?

data.value:
Are you sure you want to delete selected emulator(s) ?
Deleting emulator(s) will remove it/them from all consoles that may use this/these emulator(s).

data.value:
Looks like you're hiding the main menu for the first time !! Please remember these shortucts: Show/Hide main menu: ALT + Q Show/Hide tools bar: ALT + W Show/Hide status strip: ALT + E
In case you get confused next time :)

data.name: RomPropertiesDescription_ParentAndChildren
data.value: Allows to modify rom configuration related to "Parent and Children" mode.

data.name: Message_AreYouSureyouWantToRemoveChildren
data.value:
Are you sure you want to remove selected roms from children list ?

*These roms will not be removed from the console, only the relationship get updated
* These roms will become normal free roms.

data.name: Message_AddChildrenWarning
data.value: Warning !! If a selected rom is already a CHILD to another parent rom, the old parent-child relationship will be removed and this CHILD rom will become a child to this current rom. (CHILD roms cannot be shared). Do you still want to continue ?

data.name: Message_ParentRomMustHaveCHILD
data.value: A parent rom MUST have at least one CHILD !

data.name: ConsolePropertiesDescription_RomRenaming
data.value: Allows to configure console auto renaming for its roms when attempting to run a rom

data.value: Please enter the folder name (or script)

data.value: Please enter the name or renaming method first.

data.name: Message_IfRomIsParentRomAllChildrenWillBeRemoved
data.value: If rom is a parent rom, it will be removed along with all its children. (And all will follow the other delete options if set)
